articles.title: Kim Jong Il Looks at Vinalon Cotton
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Looks at Vinalon Cotton
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited again  the February 8 Vinalon Complex put on modern lines and watched vinalon cotton being churned out in an endless stream.
					 He watched varieties of vinalon products including vinalon cotton piled up in stacks in the vinalon band fiber packing ground.
					
					 Taking vinalon cotton in his hand and looking at it again and again for a long while, he said vinalon cotton is excellent raw material for textiles as it is as good as cotton and wool. He was greatly satisfied to see Juche-based cotton being produced in large quantities.
					
					 Greatly pleased that it has now become possible to supply more quality vinalon fabrics to the Korean people as desired by President Kim Il Sung, he said that the start of mass production of vinalon signifies a great auspicious event for the whole country as it is another great victory won by the Korean people in building a thriving nation.
					
					 He noted that the laudable successes made by the officials, workers and technicians of the complex clearly proved that the mental power of the Korean people equipped with the spirit of single-minded unity, the strong spirit of national dignity, the spirit of self-reliance, warm love for the future and the spirit of devotion serve as a motive force to win all victories and the master key to them. 
					
					 The workers of the complex have built the modern vinalon factory based on the latest science and technology by their own efforts and with their own technology and made a decisive breakthrough towards settling the issue of clothing, thereby making it possible to preserve and glorify the leadership feats of the President, the founder and pioneer of the vinalon industry, he said. He highly appreciated their shining feats once again and extended special and deepest thanks to them.
					
					 He said that the complex carries key significance in materializing the plan of the WPK to radically improve the people's standard of living, setting forth the tasks to be fulfilled by the complex to mass-produce vinalon and other chemical goods.
					
					 He emphasized that in order to send greater quantities of clothing materials to the people it is necessary to operate the newly-built vinalon processes at full capacity with a view to keeping production going at a high rate and, at the same time, dynamically push ahead with the project for expanding the factory's capacity including the construction of a carbide furnace.
					
					 The happy events taking place in all fields of the revolution and construction one after another herald a rosy future of a thriving nation in which everything prospers, he noted, earnestly calling once again for glorifying this year, the 65th anniversary of the founding of the Party, as a year of great changes and thereby bringing about a decisive turn in building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Thae Jong Su, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the WPK Central Committee, and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Greek President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Greek President
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a congratulatory message to Carlos Papoulias on his re-election as president of Greece.
					 Kim in the message wished the president success in his work for stability and development of the country.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Russian FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Russian FM
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the treaty of friendship, good neighborliness and cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 Noting that the treaty holds an important position in the development of bilateral relations as the basic inter-state treaty, the message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would develop in various fields in conformity with the spirit of the treaty, wishing him success in his responsible work.

articles.title: UN Envoy Here
articles.content:
UN Envoy Here
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- B. Lynn Pascoe, under-secretary-general of the United Nations for the Department of Political Affairs who is special envoy of its secretary general, and his party arrived here by air on Tuesday.

articles.title: Ten-day Film Show Opens
articles.content:
Ten-day Film Show Opens
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A ten-day film show to celebrate February 16 was opened with due ceremony at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday.
					 In this period people will watch documentaries showing the undying feats of General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il making an endless forced march for field guidance, regarding President Kim Il Sung's idea of believing in people as in Heaven as a maxim at cinemas and halls of culture in Pyongyang and various local areas.
					
					 They will also watch "A White Gem", "The Country I Saw", "White Birch of Paektu" and other feature films dealing with mental power of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK creating a history of new great surge under the uplifted banner of devotedly defending the leader.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony a documentary "The Great Devotion (2009, the year of dramatic changes)" was screened.
					
					 Similar film shows were opened in each province on the same day.

articles.title: Int'l Figure Skating Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
Int'l Figure Skating Festival to Be Held
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The 19th international figure skating festival for Paektusan Prize is to be held here on the occasion of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthday.
					 The festival will bring together excellent players from the DPRK and other countries and take place in the form of demonstration performance from Feb. 15 to 17.

articles.title: Opera "Evgeni Onegin" Given in Hamhung
articles.content:
Opera "Evgeni Onegin" Given in Hamhung
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The performance of opera "Evgeni Onegin" was given at the Hamhung Grand Theater from Feb. 6 to 8.
					The performance was appreciated by officials of party and power organs and working people's organizations, officials in the fields of culture and arts and media and working people in South Hamgyong Province.
					
					The opera, reproduced as required by the new century, exposes the corrupted life of the aristocratic class and the injustice of the Russian feudal society that reduced to good-for-nothing and spoiled the young people who should have done a lot of good work for the country.
					
					The performance of this opera was highly acclaimed by the audience for the perfect representation of its ideological and thematic contents through high-level acting, peculiar and rich volume, vivid stage decor, etc.

articles.title: Yu Pyol Mi Wins Int'l Juvenile Piano Concours
articles.content:
Yu Pyol Mi Wins Int'l Juvenile Piano Concours
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Yu Pyol Mi, Korean schoolgirl, was awarded the diploma for the first place and the special prize at the 56th Schumann International Juvenile Piano Concours.
					 The final contest was held Germany from Jan. 8 to 10. 
					
					 It brought together at least 70 excellent pianists under 18 from different countries and regions including the DPRK, Germany, China and Russia.
					
					 The concours were divided into six groups according to ages.
					
					  Yu, 8, placed first in the Asia-Pacific regional contest of the concours held in Beijing from September to October last year.
					
					 She successfully played piano music pieces requiring high artistic and performing skills at the finals to be acclaimed by the jury and experts, thus placing the first in the group. 
					
					 The diploma for the first place and the special prize "Grotrian-Steinweg" in the name of the organizational committee of the concours were conferred upon her at the awarding ceremony held on Jan. 31.

articles.title: New Science Films Released
articles.content:
New Science Films Released
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Korean Documentary and Science Film Studio has of late produced new films.
					 The science film "Tea Good for Health" gives an explicit explanation of the bionomical character of tea plant (Thea sinensis), pharmacological action of tea and processing method of green and black tea.  
					
					 Meanwhile, the film shows Unjong Tea getting popular among people for its great efficacy.
					
					Another science film "Rumex, High-yielding Albuminoid Feed" introduces the plant helping increase weight of domestic animals and raise their breeding and egg-laying by more than 20 percent as well as experience of stockbreeding bases benefiting from it.

articles.title: Technical Inventions Pay Off
articles.content:
Technical Inventions Pay Off
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The effort for technical updating has been amply remunerated in economic sectors of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The February 8 Vinalon Complex has built an up-to-date production base of dyes and agricultural chemicals to bring about a radical turn in chemical industry of the country.
					
					 It has applied a computer-controlled system to its high pressure pump and spraying drier to suit its actual conditions, completing a new process of dyes production.
					
					 It has also built storing, measuring and filtering facilities needed for extensive production of quality agricultural chemicals, giving no negative effect to ecosystem.
					
					 A technical team of the Chonnaeri Cement Factory in Kangwon Province, with the help of scientists from the Mathematics Research Institute under the State Academy of Sciences, has established a new automatic monitoring and control system for the cement kiln.
					
					 The system increases the cement clinker output by 20-25 percent and decreases the fuel consumption by 12-14 percent per ton of clinker. 
					
					 Scientists of the Computer Science Institute under the State Academy of Sciences and Pyongyang University of Agriculture have developed a CNC-based sower.
					
					The machine, low in both manufacturing cost and fuel consumption, can sow such seeds as rice, wheat and barley in even unharrowed or unploughed fields.
					
					 The Ministry of Electronics Industry has invented an electricity-saving socket which turns the light on automatically when it senses darkness or a sound and turns it off after a while. 
					
					 The State Academy of Sciences has directed efforts to such hi-tech projects as space development and seabed survey.

articles.title: US Commander's Remark under Fire
articles.content:
US Commander's Remark under Fire
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea made reckless remarks only to give the lie to the U.S. move for "transfer of the right to command wartime operations" to south Korea and disclose the sinister ambition for the aggression on the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun observes this in a signed commentary on Tuesday.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is an invariable strategic scheme of the U.S. to have firmer grip on south Korea and use it as a springboard from which to unleash the second Korean war and, furthermore, materialize its wild ambition for military domination over Asia.
					
					 The U.S. farce for the transfer of the right is just part of sinister military operation scenario to serve this strategic purpose. It is also a measure taken to perfect the coordination of military actions between the U.S. and the south Korean forces.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to turn its forces in south Korea into a task force capable of conducting military actions for aggression in vaster areas, not just the regional forces tasked with carrying out limited military duty in limited areas, and use the south Koran army as a shock brigade. 
					
					 Herein lies the dangerous nature of the "transfer of the right to command wartime operations".
					
					 The U.S. tries to give impression that it is set to turn over the right to south Korea and it takes its hands off the issue. But it is a cunning trick to cover the nature of the military presence of its forces in south Korea and its policy to invade the DPRK and mislead the world opinion.
					
					 This is clearly proved by the remarks made by the commander that the coordinated operation of the U.S. and the south Korean forces would remain unchanged even after the transfer of the right and that it is wrong to think that the south Korean army can take full responsibility for "defense" of south Korea.
					
					 He even blustered that the U.S. would offer more information including the "nuclear deterrent" in the future, on the premise of its use of nukes in "emergency" on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The U.S. move to ignite a new war has pushed the situation on the peninsula to tension, not to peace.
					
					 If the U.S. keeps making frantic preparations for a new war while intensifying the military control over south Korea, pursuant to its national policy to stifle the DPRK as now, the DPRK-U.S. relations will never see a solution and the situation will be pushed to the worst phase.
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it thinks it can solve problem by dint of strong arm policy and strength, shunning conclusion of peace treaty.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to face up to the reality and drop its foolish dream to put the DPRK and the rest of Asia under its control keeping hold on south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korea-US Forces' War Confab under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea-US Forces' War Confab under Fire
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- South Korean and American warmongers, at the recent 24th south Korea-U.S. "meeting on security policy initiative", groundlessly described the DPRK's routine artillery shell firing exercises in the waters of the West Sea as a "provocation". They did not bother to let loose such bellicose remarks as "close watch" on the tendency of the north, "full posture to cope with emergency" and "tightened policy cooperation." They also had a confab on working out the south Korea-U.S. "defense guidelines" which envisage "full combat readiness of the U.S. reinforcements" in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula, "provision of extended nuclear deterrence" and "provision of conditions for stable presence" of the U.S. forces in south Korea, etc. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a blatant challenge to the DPRK which has made sincere efforts for peace and durable peace mechanism on the Korean Peninsula and a premeditated hostile act against it to drive the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					 At the confab the brasshats of the south Korean military busied themselves to justify their moves to escalate confrontation with the DPRK and provoke a war of aggression against it while joining their U.S. master in making such oft-repeated sophism as "threat" from someone and "security". This deceptive farce, however, will get them nowhere.
					
					 The moves of the U.S. and the warmongers of the south Korean military for confrontation and war have gone beyond the danger line.
					
					 The south Korean war-like forces made extremely provocative outbursts for a "preemptive attack" on the DPRK and mapped out a scenario for invading the north to cope with "emergency situation" from the outset of this year. Not content with this, they had the dangerous war confab at the "meeting on security policy initiative". This goes to prove that they are set to go against the desire of the fellow countrymen for independent reunification, peace and prosperity this year, too.
					
					 The south Korean and U.S. bellicose forces' war hysteria reminds one of a new born puppy knowing no fear of a tiger as it is a foolish self-destruction little short of jumping into fire with faggot on one's back.
					
					 The DPRK loves peace and does not want war but will make merciless thousand-fold retaliatory strikes at those who desperately try to hurt it.
					
					 The south Korean authorities had better behave themselves, clearly understanding that their moves to escalate confrontation with the DPRK and provoke a war in collusion with outsiders would only bring disgraceful self-destruction.

articles.title: Anniversary of Creation of Chongsan-ri Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Creation of Chongsan-ri Observed
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates an editorial to the 50th anniversary of the Chongsan-ri spirit and the Chongsan-ri method created by President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Chongsan-ri spirit and Chongsan-ri method are the most powerful and revolutionary idea and method of mass leadership as they are based on the immortal Juche idea and the revolutionary mass line of the Workers' Party of Korea, the editorial stresses, and goes on:
					
					 The above-said spirit and method have been successfully carried forward and embodied by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They are the powerful weapon which helped strengthen in every way the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks in the DPRK, the motive force that brought about a radical turn in the ideological and moral traits and work-style of the officials and the basic source that helped effect sustained surge in all sectors of socialist construction.
					
					 The WPK saw to it that the superior assisted the subordinate, priority was given to the political work and the officials served the people. This leadership became a basic factor that realized the steel-like cohesion and unity of the revolutionary ranks and turned the whole society into a big revolutionary family.
					
					 Today, the officials called "our official" by the people are increasing in number, and they have taken the lead in the masses' advance to carry through the line and policy of the WPK in a do-or-die spirit, shouting "Follow me!" This reality is a clear manifestation of the great vitality of the Chongsan-ri spirit and Chongsan-ri method.
					
					 The editorial stresses that a great prosperous and powerful nation is sure to be built successfully as there are the wise guidance of the WPK embodying such revolutionary and powerful mass leadership method as the great Chongsan-ri spirit and method and the might of harmonious whole of all the servicepersons and people intensely faithful to the Party's leadership.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK-Russia Treaty Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK-Russia Treaty Observed
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers Tuesday dedicate signed articles to the 10th anniversary of the conclusion of the DPRK-Russia treaty of friendship, good neighborliness and cooperation.
					 They stress it is the invariable will and stand of the DPRK government and people to further consolidate and develop the bilateral relations of friendship with long history and tradition.
					
					 Noting that the two countries are significantly commemorating this anniversary through various events, Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The development process of the DPRK-Russia friendly relations in the new century goes to prove that the treaty entirely confirms to the interests of the two countries and the trend of the times and serves as a legal guarantee for steadily boosting the bonds and cooperation between the two peoples.
					
					 Over the past years manysided cooperation and exchange between the two countries have been intensified in politics, economy, science and technology, culture and other fields and, in this course, the two peoples have deepened the understanding of each other and strengthened their relationship of good neighborliness and friendship.
					
					  The two countries are working in concert to oppose the expansion of the military blocs for aggression, arms buildup and anti-peace moves.
					
					 Russia has worked hard to build a powerful and modern state and stable economy, and remarkable changes are being made in various domains of social life.
					
					 The Korean people pay attention to the Russian people's efforts for the development and stability of the country and hope that everything will go well in Russia.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the friendly relations between the DPRK and Russia will develop on better terms in the future by the joint efforts of the two peoples.

articles.title: US Accused of Threatening Peace
articles.content:
US Accused of Threatening Peace
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Organizations for the peace and reunification movement of south Korea held the 248th anti-U.S. and anti-war Friday rally for the pullback of the U.S. forces in front of the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Feb. 5. 
					 At the rally the speakers denounced the U.S. for working hard these days to plug south Korea into its missile defence system, while raising a hue and cry over the "threat from the north".
					
					 They accused the U.S. of busying itself to realize the "strategic flexibility" of its forces in south Korea, posing a threat to peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They urged the U.S. to stop working to put peace at peril and respond to the proposed talks for replacing the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty as early as possible.

articles.title: Mexican Figure Supports Korean People
articles.content:
Mexican Figure Supports Korean People
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, released a statement on Feb. 2 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 He said in the statement that the gigantic goal set by socialist Korea to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 is by no means fanciful, adding that the DPRK today is energetically pushing forward socialist construction in line with its unerring political strategy. 
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea led by Kim Jong Il has successfully embodied the Juche idea, the Songun politics, in all fields, the statement noted, expressing the conviction that the goal set by the Korean people would be attained without fail in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Meanwhile, former Deputy Prime Minister Bharat Mohan Adhikari, member of the Presidium of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist), in a statement issued on Feb. 3 called upon the close friends of the Korean people all over the world to extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their efforts to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of the President, and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Lectures, reading sessions, photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Iran, Guinea and Myanmar between Feb. 1 and 3 on the occasion of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthday.
					 On display in the venues of the photo exhibitions were photos on the immortal Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					The vice-president of the International Taekwon-Do Association in Iran said in his lecture that 
						Kim Jong Il's birth as a son of guerrillas was a great fortune not only of the Korean people but of the world progressives. The DPRK is sure to emerge a thriving nation as Kim Jong Il is wisely leading the Korean people, he stressed.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea at Kankan University of Guinea said in his lecture that what is characteristic of the creative mode of Kim Jong Il is that he is creating and building everything on the highest level that the intellectuals today have ever reached. 
					
					 The director of a publishing house of Myanmar said after watching Korean film "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" that the army and people of the DPRK would glorify this year marking the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea as a year of prosperity when the people will enjoy happiness and a year of a dramatic turn to be specially recorded in the history of building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Story of hoes Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of hoes Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February, 9 (KCNA) -- One day in February Juche 98 (2009) General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Wonsan Shoes Factory. 
					 He took a pair of women's shoes in his hands to examine its shape, color and weight and found it so heavy.
					
					 After a while, he told officials that shoes produced by the factory were very heavy and their soles were so thick that a pair of soles was enough for two or three pairs of shoes.
					
					 He then righted their wrong view that even such shoes should be fully supplied to people and urged them to produce light and quality ones for them.
					
					 The officials were touched much by his loving care of the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il se reune con una delegacion china
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il se reune con una delegacion china
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se reunio el dia 8 con la delegacion del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del Partido Comunista de China encabezada por su jefe Wang Jiarui, de visita en Corea.
					En la ocasion participaron los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Yong Il y Kim Yang Gon y el embajador chino en Corea, Liu Xiaoming.
					
					Wang Jiarui transmitio con cortesia al Dirigente un mensaje personal oral de Hu Jintao, Secretario General del CC del PCCh y Presidente de la Republica Popular China y le entrego un regalo preparado por la delegacion.
					
					Luego de expresar agradecimiento al respecto, el Dirigente rogo a Wang Jiarui que le transmitiera su saludo a Hu Jintao y departio con el en un ambiente cordial y amistoso.
					
					Y ofrecio una cena en honor de los huespedes chinos.
					
					La cena transcurrio en un ambiente cordial.

articles.title: Efectuado contacto de trabajo Norte-Sur para el reinicio del turismo
articles.content:
Efectuado contacto de trabajo Norte-Sur para el reinicio del turismo
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en Kaesong el contacto de trabajo Norte-Sur para el reinicio del turismo al monte Kumgang y a la zona de Kaesong.
					En cuanto a los sinceros esfuerzos que viene realizando hasta la fecha para la labor turistica al monte Kumgang y a la zona de Kaesong, simbolo de reconciliacion y cooperacion entre ambas partes, la parte Norte senalo como sigue:
					
					Cuando ocurrio el "incidente de la turista surcoreana en el monte Kumgang", nuestra parte expreso de inmediato el pesame independientemente de las circunstancias del caso, y dio la aclaracion detallada de sus verdaderos aspectos.
					
					En particular, en agosto del ano pasado cuando la presidenta del Grupo Hyundai del Sur de Corea estuvo de visita en Pyongyang, resolvio magnanimamente todos los problemas presentados y publico oficialmente el comunicado conjunto dando la garantia de la seguridad personal de los empleados de la parte Hyundai y los turistas surcoreanos.
					
					Ya que nuestra parte ha esclarecido totalmente la verdad de ese incidente y dado la garantia de no repeticion de tales casos y de la seguridad personal de los turistas surcoreanos, no hay ninguna razon ni condicion que impida reanudar el turismo.  
					
					A continuacion, la parte Norte sostuvo que la Sur debe retractarse de sus injustas condiciones, si estuviese interesada de veras en esa labor turistica. 
					
					La parte Norte presento un proyecto de acuerdo, que contiene su propuesta activa de reiniciar a partir del primero de marzo y el primero de abril el turismo a la zona de Kaesong y al monte Kumgang, respectivamente, con el fin de reanudar cuanto antes esta labor suspendida y preparar una coyuntura trascendental para la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur, y demando a la parte Sur tomar la posicion positiva a esa propuesta. 
					
					Sin embargo, en lugar de aceptar la iniciativa sincera de nuestra parte, la parte Sur hablo prolijamente de las llamadas "3 condiciones" e insistio absurdamente en que no podria reiniciar el turismo si la parte Norte no las aceptara. Ademas complico adrede el debate de los problemas dando gestos muy altaneros como "guardar el silencio".
					
					En el esfuerzo activo por alcanzar a toda costa un acuerdo sobre el problema de reinicio del turismo, la parte Norte refuto citando argumentos logicos y hechos la insistencia absurda y la actitud arrogante e insincera de la parte Sur que recurre a la tactica dilatoria diciendo cosas enajenadas como el "esclarecimiento de la verdad". 
					
					Sin embargo, la parte Sur se obstino en su injusto criterio, eludio finalmente el mismo debate del problema pretextando que "estudiaria" el asunto y para colmo, rehuso a fijar hasta la fecha del proximo contacto. 
					
					En fin de cuentas, el presente contacto no pudo alcanzar ningun acuerdo debido a la insincera e infiel actitud de la parte Sur.
					
					 El Norte y el Sur acordaron seguir discutiendo en lo adelante el problema sobre el reinicio del turismo al monte Kumgang y a la zona de Kaesong.

articles.title: En Pyongyang el subsecretario general de la ONU y su comitiva
articles.content:
En Pyongyang el subsecretario general de la ONU y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ATCC) -- Llegaron este martes a esta capital el enviado especial del secretario general de la ONU, B. Lynn Pascoe, quien es subsecretario general para los asuntos politicos de la misma organizacion multinacional, y su comitiva.

articles.title: Acto por 50o aniversario de creacion de espiritu y metodo Chongsanri
articles.content:
Acto por 50o aniversario de creacion de espiritu y metodo Chongsanri
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 50o aniversario de la creacion del espiritu Chongsanri y el metodo Chongsanri por el Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					Este espiritu y el metodo, que materializan la gran idea Juche y la linea revolucionaria de masas, son el autoctono metodo de trabajo que posibilita a las masas populares mantener la posicion de duenas de la revolucion y la construccion y cumplir con toda su responsabilidad y papel. Igualmente, sirven de idea y metodo de direccion a las masas, cientificos y revolucionarios, que compilan y sistematizan de modo integral la idea y la teoria del PTC en materia de la direccion a las masas. 
					
					Asistieron al acto los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios y trabajadores de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, entidades de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, las fabricas, empresas y granjas en la capital, los ejemplares funcionarios y granjeros de la ciudad de Nampho y de la comuna de Chongsan del municipio de Kangso. 
					
					 El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Thae Bok, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC.
					
					 El orador recordo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung creo el espiritu y el metodo Chongsanri durante su visita de orientacion a la comuna de Chongsan y el distrito de Kangso, realizada en febrero del 49 (1960) de la Era Juche, lo cual fue un evento historico que preparo un jalon de viraje trascendental en la lucha del PTC y el pueblo coreano por la construccion del socialismo. 
					
					 Al materializar ese espiritu y metodo en la administracion economica, el Presidente establecio el original sistema de direccion y administracion de la economia al estilo coreano para que en la construccion socialista se registrara un gran salto, destaco y continuo:
					
					 El Dirigente Kim Jong Il definio el metodo de direccion a las masas, creado por el Presidente, como el metodo de trabajo del Lider y dirigio con energia la labor para materializarlo en todo el partido diciendo que el PTC debe establecerlo estrictamente porque lucha por llevar a cabo la idea revolucionaria del Presidente. 
					
					 El original modo revolucionario del Dirigente, quien para la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo realiza incansablemente la marcha forzada de direccion sobre el terreno hacia los puestos de defensa nacional y los campos de batalla en gran auge y dirige en la realidad bulliciosa los trabajos  del partido, el ejercito y el Estado en su conjunto, es la maxima expresion del metodo de trabajo del Presidente y el gran metodo jucheano de direccion sobre la revolucion que trae relevantes triunfos en la lucha revolucionaria y la labor constructiva. 
					
					 Levantaremos sin falta sobre esta tierra la gran potencia prospera socialista siguiendo la invencible direccion del Songun del Dirigente y llevaremos a feliz termino la causa del Juche para que la sagrada historia revolucionaria del Presidente continue generacion tras generacion junto con la patria en prosperidad.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras belicas de Sur de Corea y EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras belicas de Sur de Corea y EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ATCC) -- En la recien celebrada 24a "reunion de iniciativa de la politica de seguridad" Sur de Corea-Estados Unidos, los belicistas internos y externos pronunciaron sin escrupulos unas palabras belicosas como la "vigilancia a precision" de la tendencia del Norte, la "disposicion perfecta frente al tiempo de emergencia" y el "fortalecimiento de la cooperacion en la politica", describiendo el entrenamiento rutinario de tiro de canon de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, que se efectua en el Mar Oeste, como una "provocacion". 
					Ademas, debatieron sobre el problema de elaboracion de la "guia de defensa" Sur de Corea-EE.UU. que estipule la "movilizacion de las tropas estadounidenses de refuerzo en la guerra", el "ofrecimiento del disuasivo nuclear ampliado" y el "aseguramiento de las condiciones para el estacionamiento estable" de las tropas estadounidenses ocupantes del Sur de Corea, etc. 
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual de este martes, califica esa reunion de desafio abierto a la RPDC, que se esfuerza con sinceridad por preservar la paz y establecer el sistema de paz duradera en la Peninsula Coreana, y de premeditado acto hostil a la RPDC para llevar la situacion a la fase de guerra.
					
					En esa ocasion, los caudillos de la capa militar del Sur de Corea soltaron junto con su amo gringo las ya destenidas sofisterias como la "amenaza" de alguien y la "seguridad" con el fin de justificar la confrontacion anti-RPDC y sus maniobras para provocar una guerra contra esta. Pero, nadie se dejara enganar por esos chismes, afirma el comentarista y continua: 
					
					 Ahora sobrepasan el limite de peligro las maniobras belicas y conflictivas de la capa militar surcoreana que se confabula con EE.UU. 
					
					 Desde principios del ano nuevo, los belicistas surcoreanos elaboraron un guion de agresion al Norte para el caso de la "situacion bruscamente cambiada" usando el termino extremadamente agresivo como el "ataque preventivo" contra la RPDC. Como si no bastaran con esto, realizaron los debates de guerra en dicha reunion, lo cual evidencia que ellos intentan desafiar este ano tambien a la aspiracion de la nacion a la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad. 
					
					 La locura de las fuerzas belicistas del Sur de Corea y EE.UU. es una tonteria igual a lanzarse al fuego con la gasolina. 
					
					 La RPDC ama la paz y no desea la guerra, pero, es implacable con los tipejos que tratan de perjudicarla a todo trance y les respondera con el golpe de represalia mil veces mas fuerte. 
					
					 Las autoridades surcoreanas deben actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que su campana conflictiva y belica anti-RPDC, que libran en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, les arruinara de manera vergonzosa.
